content: I’ve tried to join this content creation team and was told they are only looking for professional graphics designers and video editors? Is this still the case and how do we start sharing content?
Hello <@1268063316387827712> you can use this form to apply to the Content Creation team https://txt.democrats.org/CreatorTeamApply

While you are waiting for your application to Content Brigade to be approved, I support you to continue to share your content with your own socials as that that where it will be most impactful. You can also share memes in our https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1265762143559618624
